honor.title: FUTA BUS LINES - QUALITY IS HONOR

first.des: Phuong Trang serving an average of more than 200 million passengers/year nationwide.

second.des: Phuong Trang has more than 350 ticket offices, transit stations, bus stations, etc. throughout the system.

third.des: Phuong Trang serves more than 1,000 long-distance and intercity bus trips every day.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.JSC: FUTA BUS LINES - PHUONG TRANG INC
contact.address: Address: 01 To Hien Thanh Street, Ward 3, Da Lat City, Lam Dong Province, Vietnam.

about.name: PHUONG TRANG
about.des1: Founded in 2001 focusing on supporting the transportation needs of Vietnamese people. With main business activities in the field of buying and selling cars, passenger transport, real estate and service business. Phuong Trang has gradually become a familiar name that accompanies Vietnamese people in all fields.
about.des2: After more than 20 years of establishment and development, putting the customer as the focus, we are proud to become a core freight forwarding enterprise that actively contributes to the overall development of the transportation industry in particular and the global economy, the country's economy in general. Always improving to bring the best quality of service to customers, Phuong Trang Company has been recognized through many prestigious awards such as “Vietnam’s No. 1 Brand”, “Top 10 Famous Brands of Vietnam”, “Top 10 Perfect Services for Consumers in 2022”, “Top 10 Typical Enterprises in Vietnam”, “Top 10 Prestigious Brands, Products and Services in Vietnam – ASEAN 2022”...

s1.name: FUTA BUS LINES
s1.des: Adhering to the motto "Quality is Honor," Phuong Trang Passenger Transport Joint Stock Company – FUTA Bus Lines is currently operating over 60 fixed interprovincial passenger transport routes stretching from the South to the North, with 350 ticket offices and transfer stations, and more than 2,000 vehicles of various types, serving over 20 million passengers each year.

s2.name: FUTA LAND
s2.des: In the real estate sector, Phuong Trang has achieved certain accomplishments with high-quality products such as Da Nang Times Square, a luxury apartment complex in Son Tra District, Lien Chieu District, and many other projects that are gradually being completed.

s3.name: FUTA EXPRESS
s3.des: Alongside the development of Phuong Trang passenger transport, we have recognized an essential demand for cargo transport accompanying passengers and cargo not accompanying passengers. To meet the needs and the trust of customers in Phuong Trang Company, Phuong Trang Express Delivery Service Joint Stock Company – FUTA Express was established. Over a decade of development, FUTA Express has gradually become a unit for cargo transport and business development. FUTA Express has been and is investing in more transaction offices, vehicles, and separate transport services to ensure quick and safe service for customers.

s4.name: FUTA CITY BUS
s4.des: The FUTA City Bus public passenger transport sector is an important piece in the main activities that Phuong Trang Company aims for. Investing in high-quality new vehicles, Phuong Trang buses provide passengers with full amenities such as air conditioning, Wi-Fi, along with a professional team of drivers and staff. Phuong Trang buses are committed to offering customers safe and comfortable journeys at reasonable prices, with the motto "Quality is Honor." Currently, Phuong Trang buses are present in 07 provinces: Dong Thap, Lam Dong, Thua Thien Hue, Khanh Hoa, Can Tho, An Giang, and Ninh Thuan. Following 2022, the company will officially launch new bus routes in the provinces of Ho Chi Minh City, Vinh Long, Dong Nai, Tien Giang, and Bac Lieu, maximizing the travel needs of the people, reducing personal vehicles, and contributing to transforming the transportation landscape towards a more modern and streamlined approach.

s5.name: FUTA REST STOP
s5.des: Understanding the need for rest and relaxation of passengers on long journeys through many provinces and cities, Phuong Trang Company also invested in the Phuc Loc bus stop system in key areas such as Tien Giang, Lam Dong, Ben Tre, Vinh Long, Soc Trang... The Phuc Loc bus stop system is comprehensively invested, ensuring to serve a large number of customers 24/7.

logoutDialog.title: Logout Confirmation
logoutDialog.message: Are you sure you want to logout?

validator.emailAtLeast: Email must be at least 5 characters
validator.emailAtLast: Email must be less than 50 characters
validator.emailNotValid: Please enter a valid email address
validator.notContainA: Email must contain only one '@' character
validator.passwordAtLeast: Password must be at least 6 characters

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellationPolicy.exchangeOnce: Tickets can only be exchanged once.
cancellationPolicy.costExplanation: The cost of ticket cancellation is from 10% to 30% of the fare depending on the cancellation time and the number of tickets.
cancellationPolicy.contactInstruction: Contact Call Center 1900 6067 or the ticket counter at least 24 hours before departure.

boarding.title: Requirements when boarding
boarding.arrivalTime: Arrive 30 minutes before departure (60 minutes for holidays and Tet).
boarding.presentTicket: Show ticket information sent via SMS/Email/Futa App or contact counter.
boarding.noStrongOdors: Do not bring food/beverages with strong odors on board.
boarding.noSmokingAlcohol: No smoking, alcohol, or stimulants on the bus.
boarding.noLittering: Do not litter on the bus.

baggage.title: Hand Baggage
baggage.maxWeight: The total weight of luggage must not exceed 20kg.

childrenPregnant.title: Children & Pregnant Passengers
childrenPregnant.childTicketPolicy: Children under 6 years old, under 1.3m tall, and under 30kg don't need a ticket.
childrenPregnant.maxOneChild: Each adult may accompany one child.
childrenPregnant.pregnantCaution: Pregnant passengers should ensure their health during the trip.

pickup.title: Pick-up Ticket
pickup.registerPickup: Contact hotline 19006067 at least 2 hours before departure. Prepare compact luggage (max 20kg).
pickup.pickupLocationNote: Pick-up is available only at select locations along the route.

Transshipment.title: Door-to-door Pickup/Dropoff
Transshipment.guestTime: Time to receive guests: 4 hours before.
Transshipment.pickupTime: Pick up time: Prepare 2–3 hours in advance. The driver will contact you directly due to traffic and multiple pickup points.
Transshipment.smallAlleys: Cars cannot turn in small alleys: Pickup at the start of the alley/street.
Transshipment.noParking: No-pickup zones: Pickup at the nearest location possible due to no-parking signs.
Transshipment.luggage: Luggage: Compact under 20kg, no pets, no odorous or leaking items allowed.

Schedule.note: The times of landmarks are estimated times. This schedule is subject to change depending on the actual situation of early or late departure.

returnModal.title: Return Ticket
returnModal.des: Do you want to return this ticket and receive money back to your Futa account?

book.term1: Please be at the departure station of the bus at least 30 minutes before departure time, bring the confirmed email which contain reservation code in order from the FUTA BUS LINE system. Please contact Hotline 1900 6067 for support.
book.term2: Please call 1900 6918 for shuttle bus service. Shuttle bus services range is limited, therefore, we will not pick passengers who are outside the range of service. Thank you!

validations.passwordAtLeast: Password must be at least 8 characters
validations.emailAtLeast: Email must be at least 5 characters
validations.emailAtMost: Email must be at most 50 characters
validations.emailNotValid: Please enter a valid email address
validations.notFillAll: Please fill in all required fields
validations.notSelectSeat: Please select at least one seat
validations.maxSeat: You can only select up to 5 seats
